Tom was cooking bacon for breakfast. The smell woke up his entire family. They were all equally hungry. Tom decided to make more bacon for everyone. His family loved him for it.

Michelle was looking forward to going to prom with her boyfriend Mark. Mark cancelled two hours before prom, he was sick. Michelle did not know what to do. She went anyway. She ended up having a great time, dancing with her friends.

The club had a new home. They had built a fancy new clubhouse. They threw a big party when the clubhouse was open. Everyone had a great time. The club was excited to hold more events there in the future.

Frank was on a family trip. They were supposed to arrive at their family's house by dinner. On the highway they hit a huge amount of traffic. It was taking so long. By the time they got out, they were set back hours in their drive.

Neil loved seeing beautiful natural wonders. Since he was visiting Ireland, he knew where to go. He had heard so much about the Cliffs of Moher. He took a trip there and he had to agree with the other visitors. The Cliffs of Moher were absolutely breathtaking!

Lorrie was outside trimming the hedges in her georgia home. She went inside to grab a drink. She heard a noise coming from the bedroom. It was her husband lonnie with another woman. Lorrie filed for divorce the day after.

Tony was driving down the road with his sister in the car. A deer jumped out and almost hit them. Tony swerved and put his arm out to protect his sister. The deer ran off and Tony was able to straighten out the car. His sister was happy that Tony's instinct was to protect her.

Scout wanted to make herself a new PC. She did a lot of planning and budgeting. Having it capable of gaming in high quality was important. Assembling the parts was a huge hassle. The machine ran great for many Years when she got it together.

Alicia wanted to go to Miami for her party. She invited all her friends to come join. The girls all had fun. Until Julie brought her boyfriend. The girls were mad because it was supposed to be a girls trip.
Bob wanted to buy a new car. He looked online at local dealerships. Bob found a car he really liked. He went to the dealership to test drive the car. The car was so perfect that he bought it.

Marvin had a date with his girlfriend. When it was time to go he couldn't find his phone. He decided he should call her and tell her he was running late. Suddenly he realized he needed his phone for that. Marvin didn't know what to do.

I've always been scared of water parks. My friends invited me to Big Surf, and I was scared. When we got to the big slide, I was terrified. I went down and landed in the pool! I survived the big slide, and was ready for more.
Derek always eats at his desk. His boss always tells him not to. One day Derek spilled spaghetti. He got sauce all over his keyboard. The keyboard had to be replaced.

Jill's mom sent her into the donut shop to buy a dozen. She selected 12 donuts. The worker said to pick one more. He told her they sold baker's dozens, which were 13. But she still only had to pay for 12.
Mike loved to play basketball. He practiced everyday. He loved to shoot 3 pointers. He impressed the coaches at his school in tryouts. Mike made the basketball team for his high school team.
Beckett was a hungry little boy. He asked his mom to make him lunch. She made him a grilled cheese sandwich. It was so yummy! Now Beckett has a full belly.

Ang wanted to become healthier so she changed her diet. She was finding it easy to adjust her diet until it came to chips. Her favorite thing to do was to eat a bag of chips before bed. She knew this was unhealthy so she searched for an alternative. And found that carrots had a nice crunch and that replaced her chips.

Ashley had just gotten her driver's license. It was her first time driving by herself. Without her mother's help, the winding roads quickly confused her. She knew she was lost, and pulled over to ask for directions. The clerk at the gas station guided her on her way.

Jim allowed Hannah to stay in his house since she lost her house. In the morning, he brought some soup for her. After she took a sip, she threw the bowl on the ground. She also demanded that he cooks something else for her. After that, he decided to kick her out of the house.
Our granddaughter Anna is two and a half. She arrived in Boston from NJ tonight. It was well past her bedtime. She wanted to play but she had to sleep. It took awhile, but she finally fell asleep.
A friend of mine did a big favor for me. I wanted to find a way to repay her. I decided to make her a nice fruit basket. I bought the brightest and freshest fruits. They looked perfect together.

I wanted chocolate ice cream. I went to the kitchen to get some. Upon arriving in the kitchen, I found my boyfriend eating the last bit I tried not to look sad but I wanted chocolate! So I went to bed grumpy.
Jenny has a drinking problem. Jenny got arrested for public intoxication. Jenny was in jail for three days. Jenny could not write a check for rent from jail. Jenny got evicted.

Anne was reading the newspaper with her morning coffee. She found an advertisement for a used sedan. Anne had been looking for a used family car for awhile. She decided to contact the owner of the used sedan. After negotiating on the phone, Anne bought the car for $5000.

Aline was studying in America. She wasn't happy when she learned where she would study. She was sent to rural Tennessee. Aline looked at all the cows and trucks driving around. Aline regretted having chosen the US to study in.

Frank needed a good job. He walked to every business he could find and asked for a job. Everywhere he went, they said no. Frank was about to give up. The last business he went to gave him a job as a cashier!

Jane couldn't see the board from the back of the classroom. She traded her desk with another student. She was sure this would make it easier to see the chalk board. But everything was still a little blurry. She hoped this didn't mean she needed glasses.

Jim has been looking forward to seeing his favorite band for months. When they cancel at the last minute he has nothing to do that day. So he takes a road trip with his girlfriend to the beach. They bring lunch and hang out at the beach all day. Dan has a lot more fun doing that than some stupid concert.
Miles loved to collect rocks. He went searching for rocks one day in the desert. He searched high and low. He found many new rocks for his collection. Now his collection is to be envied.

Jane had a lot of old clothes. She always bought new stuff. She would normally throw things away. A friend convinced her to donate them instead. Jane started doing that instead and felt good about it.

I needed a good plastic drink dispenser for halloween. I found one that was shaped like a large clear skull. I filled it with the sodas. I put in frozen cubes shaped like eyeballs. The whole family as well as friends loved it.

Jennifer was cooking dinner. As she was cooking, she started to smell smoke. She could not figure out where it was coming from. Then she remembered she had roles in the oven. She looked and they were on fire.

Cathy wanted a unique centerpiece for her wedding. Cathy decided that she wanted a ice sculpture for the centerpiece. Cathy told her wedding planner what she wanted for her centerpiece. At the wedding, Cathy was blown away at the huge ice sculpture. Cathy loved the ice sculpture so much, and so did her guests.

Bob went to the local pet store, to look for a new puppy. He asked the clerk to see the Yorkshire Terrier. Bob played with the Yorkshire Terrier for about an hour. He purchased the dog, and got a few accessories for his new pet. He took the dog home, and welcomed it to its new home.

John and Jenna loved road trips. They especially loved to find different routes. There were often unexpected sights along the way. Many of their friends would rather fly than drive. They thought this idea was just crazy!

Marsha was upset about getting assigned the difficult project. All projects at the firm paid equal amounts. Marsha complained to her co-workers about her assignment. One of her co-workers reported Marsha to the supervisors. Marsha was assigned the project and not given a bonus that year.

Cindy came back from school. And she was very hungry and tired. She found leftover cake in the refrigerator. So she ate the cake instead of preparing something healthier. Later, Cindy became too sick to go to school for the next two days.

I built a large treehouse in our backyard. The tree was a willow, which are known to be brittle. Whenever a wind kicks up, the tree sways side to side. All of the nails pulled out of the branches. I kept the kids out, and eventually the tree house collapsed.

Albert was struggling to make more money. He decided to start dealing drugs. He made more money than he ever expected. One day he was arrested and it changed his life for the worst. He now wishes that he wasn't so foolish with his life.

Tom was at the mall. He was helping his wife shop. He looked away at something for a while. When he got back he went up to hug who he thought was his wife. It was someone else wearing similar clothing.

Heather was running errands with her baby all day. Usually the baby took a morning nap but not today. Soon the baby began to grow fussy. By the time Heather was nearly done the baby was wailing. Luckily she got him home then and he got his nap.

Two runners were in a tight competition on a mile race. In the last 100 meters they were shoulder to shoulder. One runner tripped and fell on his face. The other runner ran past him and won the race. The runner who tripped congratulated the winner.

I ate at McDonald's the other day. When I got home I started to feel sick. I started getting stomach cramps and I threw up. I had to call out of work the next day. I will never eat at McDonald's again.
Larry was cleaning his gun in his house. He had forgotten to unload the gun. The gun went off as Larry cleaned it. The gun shot a hole through Larry's ceiling. Larry's wife was livid over the damage.
The kids were playing freeze tag. Paul kept getting caught. Nobody unfroze him for some reason. He was very upset by this. He cried and left the game.

When I was 16 I wanted to get my driver's license. I went to the department of motor vehicles and took a written test. After passing the test, I had to practice for the driving test. When it was time for the driving test, I passed but just barely. Any passing grade is enough to get the license, so I was happy!

Jeff went to the pharmacy to get his medication. The front desk worker mixed some of the tablets without labeling them. She ended up giving Jeff the wrong prescription. He felt odd when he decided to take it at home. A few days later, he suffered from a minor heart stroke.

Melissa needed to make dinner for her family. She was tired of cooking the same meals over and over. She looked in a cookbook for a new recipe. She found all the ingredients she needed in the refrigerator. Melissa cooked dinner and her family loved it.

My friend and I decided to go to school to review for a test. Before we started, she wanted to get a drink from the vending machine. When she put her dollar in, she entered a number in. A Coca-Cola bottle came out. However, another bottle surprisingly came out.
Sharon was with Tommy for two years. They were in love together. One day Sharon noticed Tommy wasn't picking up his phone. Sharon went to Tommy's House. Found him with another Woman and Dumped him.
I sneezed as I woke up this morning. I knew immediately that something was not right. By the time I made it out of the shower I was coughing. I went right back to bed. I need to rest and get better.
Tim smoked his entire life. He decided to quite for his health. It was really hard at first. Tim often caved and smoked. After a while it became easier to stop.

Dave was a recluse. He rarely left the house, usually only to get the mail. Last Friday he noticed Tom moved in next door. Dave thought he'd go introduce himself. Today Dave found himself knocking on Tom's door, smiling.
Chad looked for a clean pair of pants. He looked in the closet to find none. He looked in the dryer for a pair. He looked in his car. He bought a new pair at the mall, again.

Terri jogged alone everyday. She always passed a house that has been empty for a long time. Today there was a family moving in. Terri made friends with one of the family's oldest daughter. Terri doesn't job alone anymore.

Ramon visited a dude ranch for his birthday. He had never ridden a horse before, but he was excited to try. Things went well at first, but then the horse bolted. Ramon thought that he might fall off, but he held on. It was one of the most exciting birthdays Ramon ever had.

Cheyenne tried to keep up with her friend David as they walked. She couldn't believe he wouldn't slow down for her. After about an hour she started wondering if he was really her friend. She would have just sat down and let him go but she couldn't. David was the only one who knew his way back to the car.
There was a lazy cow on Bill's farm. The cow never got up. One day Bill bought new cow food. The cow knew so he got up. Then the lazy cow was never lazy again.

Phil loved road trips. He took a long one almost every year. His friends would pick a random place on the map and go. This year they chose to go to the Grand Canyon. Phil got stuck at work though and was not able to go.
Ajay wanted a new car. Unfortunately, he couldn't afford one. Luckily, the bank offered him a car loan. Ajay now had enough money. Ajay bought a new car.

Morgan lost her phone charger. She couldn't find it anywhere. She looked throughout her house and her car. Finally, she found the cat behind the couch with the charger. She had dragged it there by the cord!

William had a great big beard. He loved it more than anything. William had a job interview and knew he needed to look good. William decided to shave off his beard. William landed the job and lost his beard.

A marine earned a medal for his service in Iraq. After he had been home for a month he went to a fast food restaurant. He got tormented by a group of racially motivated teens. He was brutally beaten. His new injuries surpass any he had succumbed to in Iraq.

I used to have a couch upstairs in my room. One day I decided to move it downstairs. The couch was really heavy and hard to move. I had to call my friends over to help me move it. Eventually, after a lot of work, we got the couch downstairs.
I wanted to buy a sparkly ring. I did some research on diamonds. I decided I did not want them. I found moissanite and fell in love. I purchased a ring with a moissanite stone.
Suzy wanted something different with her hair. She decided to buy a boxed dye. When Suzy was done she loved her color. Her friend liked it so much she bought a box. Suzy wanted to it again.

Kerry sold men's watches at a high-end jewelry store in New York. Kerry like his job, but he had to move to Texas with his parents. He got a new job at another jewelry store. Kerry had trouble selling expensive watches in Texas. He quit his job at the jewelry store, and got a job selling cars.

I had a job chopping vegetables for a salad bar. My coworker and I would compete to see who could chop faster. We also peeled eggs and carrots together. One day, I went to work and found out that she had quit. I felt very lonely without her around.
Sam had set his alarm to get up for work. There was a bad storm. The storm knocked out the power. His alarm clock was reset. Sam's alarm didn't go off.

The first astronaut on Mars was about to leave for earth. He stopped one more time and watched the scenery. He climbed in his ship and set coordinates for earth. In the 5 months journey home he couldn't stop thinking of Mars. When he got home, he never really felt home.
Kelly slept through her alarm. She woke up twenty minutes late. She had to rush through her morning routine. Then she sped through traffic. Luckily, she made it to work on time!
Cathy got off the bus. She walked up the street. On her way she seen something in the road. She walked up to it. She discovered a pair of shoes.

Bob was really interested in the product the company was selling. He went to their website with the intent to buy it. As soon as their page opened, a popup filled his whole screen. Bob couldn't find the close button on it to dismiss it. Frustrated, he closed the tab and didn't buy the product.

Frank wanted to be wealthy when he grew up. He often would daydream about being wealthy. When he graduated from college he started his own business. His company became very profitable. Eventually Frank became very wealthy.

Han had a cat named Fluffy Socks. One day, her cat went out to play and never returned. Han was scared because tomorrow was moving day. Han moved five miles away, but left her cat's toy on the new porch. Fluffy Socks appeared at Han's new house the next day!

Mike was raised in Italy. It was there that he learned the secrets of a perfect pizza. He moved to America as a young man. He quickly opened up a pizza shop and became a local favorite. Mike has been making the most delicious pizza's in America since!

Ryder and Sadie went to a winery on a hot July day. They bought a case of wine bottles. Ryder and Sadie put the wine in their trunk. While they were driving they heard something hitting the trunk. The wine was exploding in the trunk because it was so hot!

Allie always got up late in the morning. One day she was very late in waking up. But the school bus beeped and still waited. Allie was embarrassed that that happened. But her bus driver was nice and did not mind.

My cat, in usual fashion, darted up to the sofa's edge. Though a normal greeting from him, it was met by surprise! My empty glass, hanging by my pinky, had almost been dropped. Nothing had spilled, but I wondered why I'd reacted so strongly. He then drank from a glass on that sofa, without anyone's permission!

Jimmy joined the football team his sophomore year. He practiced hard every day, staying longer than his teammates. He was nervous about his first game, which was only a week away. Therefore, he drove himself harder than before. On the day of the game, he was so tired that he didn't perform well.
Clark was walking down the sidewalk. He saw a man fall to the ground. The man was holding his chest. Clark called 911. Clark's quick actions saved the man's life.

Marcus thought his high school team couldn't win the championship. Surprisingly, the basketball team made it to the big game. Marcus was the starting forward and carried the team. The score, in the fourth quarter, was 72 to 74. Marcus passed to his guard who nailed a three-pointer for the win!

James forgot to do his homework assignment. He emailed his professor explaining that he had been sick all week. His professor responded a few hours later. His professor let James turn in his assignment next week. James completed his assignment and received a B on it.

I drove the pirate down Main and towards Broadway. He looked pretty scruffy, but smelled nice enough. I decided I wasn't going to charge him extra. When he got out, his sword smacked against the side of my cab. He paid his fare, giving me a twenty as a tip and a chocolate coin!

Julia started Kindergarten with no idea of how to read. After many weeks of struggling, she started to read fluidly. Julia's teacher said she was the most talented person in class. She was soon placed in the Gifted and Talented program. Julia now reads at least one book per day.

One day my sister and I were riding our bikes outside. Some kids decided to bully us and take our bikes away. We told our mom and she came charging outside. Yelling, she sprayed the bullies with her hose until they surrendered. We got our bike back and no one ever bullied us again!

I lived near the beach through my entire childhood and teenagerdom. I never learned to surf. Now I feel like I ought to at least try it. I bought some lessons. I had a good time, but I will probably not keep doing it.

Jay just graduated from college. He's been finding it hard to get a job. His parents decided to make him work at the restaurant They figured if he can't work, he might as well help the family. Now he works 4 times a week.

John saw a used Jeep that he wanted to buy. He worked two jobs and saved all of his money. It took months but he finally had enough to buy the Jeep. When he went to the dealership, the Jeep was already sold. John end up buying a Ford Escape that he liked just as much.

The family next door is going camping. They've loaded everything into their brand new camper. I am going to watch their cats. They will return in 3 days. They will give me fifty dollars for watching their cats.

Brandy woke up one morning and stepped out to the porch. Hearing a soft mewing, she looked down to the drain pipe. She then ran to the sound and found a sickly feral kitten. Brandy took the cat to an animal hospital where it was revitalized. Brandy returned home with her new healthy friend she named Hopscotch.

Jacky was excited about her first year of college. When she finally left for college, she became homesick. While in her first year, she began to make new friends. Jacky came home for the holidays with a new perspective. Jacky appreciates more since being away at school.

Matt was at the Miami Heat game. The Heat were losing by 10 with two minutes left. Matt left the arena to get a jump on traffic. He checked his phone and saw the game was going into overtime. He tried to get back in the arena, but the doors were locked.
Sam was running as fast as he could. He already passed 2 people. He had 3 more to pass. He was almost there. Sam was near the finish line.

Chad wanted to buy his wife a special gift. Chad decided he would get her some jewelry. Chad looked online, and saw a nice diamond necklace. Chad decided he would order the diamond necklace for his wife. Chad hoped that his wife would love the necklace he bought.

Collin has always loved dogs. Lately he'd been thinking about getting one of his own. He decided to go to the animal shelter and look around. He saw two little black puppies and fell in love! Collin adopted both of them and took them to their new forever home.

Dale drove his car faster than he should have. His excess speed attracted the attention of the police. It would have been smart to pull over, but he wasn't smart. The chase lasted for twenty minutes. In the end, the police used spike-strips to flatten Dale's tires.

Frannie had a bad day. She did not want to continue working at her job. Her boss had been very rude to her. Frannie decided to put in her notice to her boss. Her boss told her to leave and not come back.

My sister in law's husband died in late November. She is still trying to cope. She felt she missed him while doing errands today. Her older sister went over to help her feel better. We made plans to see her soon.

Bo thought Anne was beautiful and he liked her alot. Anne was sensitive that boys only liked her because of her beauty. She saw them staring at her in the halls, in class, everywhere. Bo knew Anne was also smart so he gave her his favorite book. Anne, always fending off suitors, was so thrilled she fell for Bo.
Tom was driving when he saw a car crash. It was pretty bad. Tom decided to pull over. He called for help and then ran to help. He was able to comfort people as paramedics arrived.
Jon wanted to form a team. We were hesitant at first. Decided to join and had a blast. We won every game and celebrated. Ended up going out as a team afterwards!

Cayla was running in the park one day when she fell to the grass. She tried to stand back up but the world around her was spinning. She started to cry and her mom ran to her to care for her. She told her mom everything was spinning and they went to the ER. The ER Doctor diagnosed Cayla with having vertigo.
Twas the night before christmas. Chad got out at 12 am to get the cookies. He then saw his parents putting gifts under the tree. He was shocked. He found out Santa was his parents.

One day Adam wanted to take anger out on a date. He figured he should call her and tell her. He called her and told her to get ready. Angel wore a beautiful blue dress. Adam told Angel she looked very lovely.
John was tired of getting bullied. John wanted to learn self defense. John learned karate. John stood up the bully using his skills. The bully never bothered John again.

Benjy was excited for his high school reunion. It had been many years since he had seen most of his classmates. At the reunion, Benjy drank too much alcohol. Benjy threw up in the restroom and passed out. He woke up several hours later after most people had already left.
The woman took off her shirt. Her window was open. She saw someone watching. She stared at the person watching. The person looked away.

Terri was heartbroken when the dog she'd had since childhood died. In her grief she vowed never to own another dog. But soon she started dating Dan, who had a beloved dog of his own. She was worried, but the moment she met Ruby she loved her. She would never forget her dog, but now knew she could love another.

Eliza was serious with her piano practice. She woke up two hours before dawn every day. She was very praised by her piano teacher and didn't dare changing. But Eliza was exhausted and just wanted to have fun. She cut down an hour on her practice and played an hour after school.

I got fed up of having too much work on my plate at my job. I gave my two week notice and three weeks ago was my last day. I ran into a former co-worker today who was excited to see me. She said my job had been split up among two people. Nevermind that I told my boss that's what needed to be done.

Rose was a single mother who needed money badly. She worked as a waitress in a city diner. One day a patron offered her a thousand dollars for some nude photos. Rose thought about it all night during her shift. At the end of her shift she told the patron she would not do it.
Jim was a paramedic. His ambulance was called to the scene of a terrible accident. A car had crashed into a house. A little boy was trapped in the car. Jim saved the little boy.
Janet was lost in the desert. Her phone had no battery. She walked aimlessly. Eventually she was too dehydrated. They found her body months later.

Annie wanted to put on a puppet show. She made three puppets out of old socks. She then constructed a puppet theater out of an old cardboard box. She invited her parents and two brothers to the show. Her family clapped and hollered for an encore after the show was over.

The judge looked at the defendant before him. The defendant began to sweat greatly. The judge asked him about his sweat. The defendant said he was nervous due to his guilt. The judge declared the man to be guilty.

Eric was on his way to the store. He was going to buy some snacks for the football game. He decides to pick up a lottery ticket too. Eric goes home and watches the game. The next day Eric wakes up and realizes he has won the jackpot!

Kathy had learned some new hair tricks. She read that coconut oil was great for hair. She tried it but something went wrong. Her hair came out horribly greasy. It turned out that she had used way too much oil

Sara was walking home from her college class. At an intersection, she noticed there was a hole in her backpack. Her books had fallen out without her noticing. She ran back the way she came and picked up all of her books. By the time she got back, it was time to go to school again.

Two friends went on a hike in the woods. They decided to take an unmarked trail. After a while on the unmarked trail they were lost. One friend suggested they followed the nearby river back. The river led them right back to their car.

Geoffrey was a very timid boy in the 5th grade. His teacher often made fun of him and his classmates were very mean. One day his teacher asked a very nasty question in front of the class. Geoffrey was embarrassed but then made a joke about the teacher. The whole class erupted in laughter and Geoffrey was their new hero.

Tom needed to buy food and diapers. The problem was that he had absolutely no money. He decided to sell his favorite guitar amp. Luckily someone bought it for more than he needed. The money helped even though he was very sad.

Mike and Clara decided to go on vacation to Chicago. It was their first flight together. When sat on the plane, both got really nervous. During the flight everything was going great. They made it safely and enjoyed their vacation.
Chad wanted to be a poet. He wrote a lovely poem. Then he entered it in the talent show. He did not expect to win. But Chad took home first prize!
Jeb wanted to learn the alphabet. However he kept forgetting. His mother told him to practice. He practiced everyday. Soon, he could say it clearly from memory.

Charles saw an ad that said a big company was hiring. He e-mailed that company his resume. But a temporary job placement agency called Charles. They said they were handling the recruiting for the big company. Later, the agency said that company wasn't hiring but others were.

Marcus was playing his guitar at school. His friend Matthew approached him and asked about the music. Soon they were in a heated conversation about their music tastes. The duo decided that they should collaborate on some music. The resulting album was very popular with all of their friends.

Jake asked his mother to take him to the air show. Since he asked for months she decided to take him. They didn't have the best seats but he was still able to see clearly. Jake laughed with glee as he watched the planes perform tricks. After his mother purchased a souvenir he begged for.

Our fig bush is getting big. It has more figs on it than we can eat. Fresh figs don't last very long before they spoil. We don't like for our food to go to waste. We decided to dehydrate our figs so we could enjoy them later.
Tina was driving home. It was dark and she got a flat tire. She pulled over to the side of the road. While calling for help a cop pulled up. The cop changed her tire for her.

Rafael took his baby son Matteo to the zoo for the day. Before they left, his wife Jane told him to bring an extra pacifier. Rafael was in a hurry to get there before it got busy. Matteo threw his pacifier into the monkey enclosure and began to wail. Rafael now carries two extra pacifiers with him at all times.
Mary and Joe have been together for Years. Joe has a big surprise for Mary tonight. He took her to a romantic dinner. He knelt down on his knee and proposed. She said yes!

Jane and her husband never had any free time. They worked and raised three kids. One night the oldest kid offered to babysit. Jane and her husband were able to go out and have fun. They greatly enjoyed their night out.

Dan recently retired from his 30 year career with the post office. Dan decided he would work part time during his retirement. Dan applied to a local grocery store as a night time stock man. Dan was pleased to hear he got the position at the grocery store. Dan was excited to be starting his new part time job.
Laura has been out of work. She applies for a part time job. She gets  call the next day for an interview. She goes to the interview dressed to impress. She nails the interview and gets the job.

Cara had made a sandwich tray for her son's party. But her fridge broke, and the sandwiches spoiled! Cara was devastated. Then she called a sandwich shop for a hasty replacement tray. Her son's guests never even knew the difference!

It was Meghan's birthday and nobody gave her anything. She was sad but didn't show it. When she went home she cried herself to sleep after wine. The next day her work threw her a surprise birthday party. Meghan felt better and a little silly too.

There was a little girl standing by the road. My dog and I walked past her as she waved hello. I realized she was deaf, and spoke to her in sign language. She smiled happily and signed back to me. We talked for about 10 minutes before we went home.

Amanda was such a cheery girl. She decided to move to New York for work. Upon arrival, she was so cheerful and happy while walking around. But people frowned at her and looked at her crazy for her happiness. She decided to assimilate, and started frowning everywhere she went.
The Jensen family were all quite excited. Tonight was the big meteor shower. They had all stayed up late to watch it. The meteors began raining down. The family had a great time that night.
I was bored. I decided to play with some matches. I accidentally set someone's house on fire. I was arrested and sentenced to prison for arson. I learned that I shouldn't play with matches.

Gina's mom was sleep on the couch at her grandma's house. So Gina couldn't watch TV. But she wasn't ready to go to bed. She decided she would read instead. But the only magazine her grandparents had was about News.
John was at a friends house. They were making dinner together. He started to slice carrots. Then he cut his finger. His friend got him a band-aid.

Edna needed a new dress for the school dance. She went to the mall with a friend to try them on. After trying on at least a hundred dresses, she was discouraged. Then she saw a dress that she fell in love with. It fit her perfectly and she bought it on the spot.

Roy remembered a report that was due soon and he did not start it yet. The problem was he was on the other side of town. He raced to get a taxi. Finally home he frantically wrote his report. He sent the report in a email with only minutes to spare.

Gary always wanted to be a truck driver. He graduated high school and started looking for a job. His parents wanted him to go to college but he didn't want to. He chose to go to a quick driving school. He got a good job right after school and reached his goals.

John had worked for his company for many years. He worked hard and often did more than his job required. One day, John's boss called him into an empty office. He told John that the company appreciated all his work over the years. Finally, he told John that John was getting a promotion and a raise!

Helen and her friends decided to go to a Trump rally. They entered the arena excited. The music was very loud and crazy. The girls couldn't believe they were there. At the end of the day they had fun.

Alexander didn't like to admit he was wrong. He had made a mistake at work and couldn't take the blame. He tried to pin the mistake on a colleague. But his boss learned about it. Alexander was humiliated and had to admit he was wrong.

Adam felt that he was out of shape. Adam decided he would start a healthy routine. For starters, Adam started to make healthier food choices. In addition, Adam started a new exercise routine. Adam's hard work was paying off, as he had lost 10 pounds.
Nancy hates spiders. She saw one in her apartment the other day and freaked out. She screamed and ran away. It took all her courage to go back and kill it. But when she returned it was gone.
The family had never been on a cruise. They decided to give it a try. Their cabin was tiny and cramped. They enjoyed the different ports, though. They decided never to cruise again.

Dan took his son to the local carnival. The first ride they saw was the strawberry spinning cups. Since the ride was low-risk, they decided to try it out. His son unexpectedly threw up. Luckily, he felt better after a few minutes.

Ron was playing football outside with his friends. Ron tackled one of his friends. His friend fell and sprained his wrist. Ron and his friends decided to stop playing tackle football. They started playing tag football instead.

We have been studying geology in school. Stone Mountain is a very large piece of granite. Our teacher took us on a field trip to Stone Mountain. We had to climb the mountain to the top. It was very hard, but we did it!

There was a huge storm brewing. The family stayed inside their home. They watched the television for alerts. A tornado was expected to hit their town. After many hours of waiting, the family was unaffected by the storm.
My family did not want to cut the grass at the edge of our yard. It was steep there. And it was on a busy street. So we got landscaping timbers. And we planted shrubs there.

The three friends had waited for about half an hour. They had gotten fed up with waiting Trish so they each called her. Frustration turned to worry when they hadn't received an answer. They got on their bikes and made their way to her home. Trish's brother said that Trish was asleep so they angrily left.
I was browsing the World Wide Web. I found a site I liked. I looked through the site. I saw lots of kittens. I bookmarked the site for later.
Tim was drinking and watching television. An intense scene came up. It made Tim jump up. He accidentally kicked over his glass of water. Tim felt silly and cleaned it up.

Ashton got a new pet hamster. The hamster is very shy and timid. She tries to play with him but he doesn't want to leave the cage. She ended up buying a new toy to lure him out. The hamster came out of the cage to play with the toy.
Maria was in love with a man. He was much older than her however. Her parents disapproved of such a relationship. Maria went with her heart. And lived to marry this man at last.

Amy had a hard time understanding questions, even basic ones. She was even with this difference a great person in and out. One day a man came and wanted to sell her insurance, for a fair price. She was confused as to why she needed this since she never had it. The man walked away,confused himself as to how that woman became that.

Ana had always wanted to dance ballet. Finally she talked her mom into letting her take a class. She went to it happily, focused and determined. But the class was very difficult and not like she'd thought. Ana decided ballet was not for her, after all.
The woman flirted with the man. The man asked her on a date. She accepted the offer. They went to the movies. They kissed during the movies.

Sarah always dreamed of becoming a mother. Sarah and her husband decided to have kids. She got pregnant and was excited to meet her new baby. It turned out Sarah was expecting twins. Sarah's hands and heart and now full with children.

Graham was trying to get to sleep. Suddenly, he felt something painful. He jumped up and saw a red mark on his leg. He knew it was a bite, so he began searching through his blankets. Suddenly, he saw a spider scurry off into the wall.

Heather is at work and she is hungry. She decided that she has a craving and wants Chinese food. Because she is at work she needs to wait until her shift ends. She leaves work right around dinner time and drives to the restaurant. She walks in, sits down, and finally orders her Chinese food to eat.

Warren hired Denis on a whim. He regretted his decision very fast. Denis was insubordinate and lazy. In fact, Denis' behavior was so bad it reflected badly on Warren. His supervisor called him to fire him for bad judgment.

Bill gathered his bed sheets and put them in the laundry. He went to his closet to get a clean set of sheets. Bill picked two different sets that he liked. He had a hard time deciding which one to use. Bill decided to mix up the two sets as a compromise.

Rero Rero was an award winning novelist. He was invited to a late night talk show to speak about his new book. When he arrived, he got in a fight with one of the production staff. He was carted off to jail with a broken jaw, and the show was canceled. When the story broke, sales for Ringo's new book skyrocketed.

Growing up, I never looked much like my two older brothers. One day, my brother Mark told me that was because I was adopted. I was devastated by hearing this. I tearfully confronted my parents with this revelation. They punished Mark severely for having told me such a lie!
There is a vacuum that cleans a pool. I learned to start it with someone else. It took both hands. But I was able to start it alone. My boss was happy with me.

Eileen's shopping trip at the new grocery store had taken a long time. In a hurry, she hopped in her car but saw many people behind her. She decided to pull forward out of her spot instead of backing out. But she hadn't realized there was a small curb in front of her! She was embarrassed when everyone saw her car get stuck over the curb.

I gave a ride to a friend the other day. I realized that my car was low on gas. I figured I could make it without getting gas. As I dropped them off, the gas light went on. Luckily, I barely made it to a nearby gas station.

Robert always wanted to run a marathon. He found out that there was a marathon happening this summer. He decided to train all semester to compete in that marathon. On the day of the marathon, Robert suddenly fell ill. He figured there was always next time.

Joe is packing the last of the items he needs for his trip to the bay. He takes special care in loading his new speargun. As soon as it's in, he hooks up the boat to the back of his truck. He takes one last look at the back and starts the vehicle. At last, he's on his way to his destination.

Oswald decided to drive to the store. He pulled out of his driveway and sped down the road. A policeman pulled him over. He gave Oswald a ticket for reckless driving. Oswald decided to never drive to the store again.

Rahul is happy to have a job in New York City, but he wants a friend. One day his subway car is delayed as he sits by another passenger. The passenger introduces himself at Jasper. Rahul and Jasper strike up a conversation and becomes friends. Rahul feels so happy that he has met a friend.

My brother is always back seat driving. I can't make a left without some criticism. He told me I wasn't merging correctly. He asked me why I have to drive so slow. My brother had his license revoked last year, but won't shut up.

Macy wanted to be a high school cheerleader. She practiced her school's cheer every day. It was finally time for cheerleading tryouts. Macy was very nervous but smiled the whole time. She did such a good job she made the team!
The room took a vote. The vote was tied. They argued over a tie breaker. They decided to vote on a tie breaker. The vote on the tie breaker was a tie.

I was asked to leave the church where I was a secretary. The pastor no longer wanted me working there. Half the congregation agreed, and the other half disagreed. They felt I didn't go to services there, so I shouldn't work there. Eventually, the church split into two over the ordeal.
Thomas was playing a game of baseball. He is up to bat and ready to help his team win. Thomas readies himself for the ball. The pitch comes in to Thomas fast. It hits Thomas right in the eye.
My Mom loves to shop for bargains. We went to Kroger one day. She walked over to the marked down section. They had spaghetti sauce marked down to a dollar a jar. My Mom bought almost all they had!
John was at the bar with friends. He noticed his ex girlfriend walked in. John was mildly upset. She noticed him. They exchanged pleasantries and moved on.

Dan wanted to have some a homemade banana split. Dan checked his cupboard for all the ingredients. After checking, Dan noticed that there were no bananas. Dan decided to make the split without bananas. Dan was not happy with the results, as he knew he needed bananas.

Phil needed to be at work on time. He had been late too many times before. He set three alarms but still woke up too lat. It wasn't until after he was fired that he saw what happened. He set the times for PM instead of AM.
Tom didn't have a lot of pants. He decided to buy a new pair. He went to different stores. Tom tried various pairs. He never found any he liked that much.
Sam left out food over night. He didn't think much of it. The next morning there were a bunch of ants around it. Sam tried to kill them all but couldn't. He had to send in an exterminator.

Abe knew he could make something of himself. He worked at a grocery store, and found books in the dumpster. He read all he could about the law and more. After being a successful lawyer, he headed into politics. Not but ten years later, that boy became president.
Rod was on his lunch break. He had brought leftovers from his house. He tried to microwave his food for lunch. He realized the microwave was broken. Rod decided to order pizza for lunch instead.
Yvonne wants a snack. She has been on a very strict diet lately. However, Yvonne is craving chips for a snack. She went to the pantry for her snack. Yvonne doesn't regret breaking her diet for chips.

Steven went camping, wanting to build his own shelter and live simply. He brought the essentials, and a knife that he had put away for years. Once he found a suitable spot, he began preparing his homemade tent. He pulled out the rope, and soon realized his knife couldn't cut it! He had to sleep in the open, regretting not being more prepared.

Dolph thought online encyclopedia projects were a noble human project. He signed up for an editing account. His copy-editing was bad and usually had to be redone. His original content was enthusiastic, but not rigorous enough. Dolph decided he could help best by quitting.

Max bought an old sword at an auction for fifty bucks. Max later saw a painting of Stonewall Jackson with a sword. Max became convinced the sword he bought was the same in the painting. He took the sword to be assessed by an expert. Max turned out to be right!

It was time for the airplane to land at the airport. The pilot radioed the control tower. The air traffic controller granted the plane permission to land. The pilot guided the plane towards the runway. The airplane safely landed on the runway.

Sam had just bought a new house for his family. He noticed smoke coming from his neighborhood. When he drove up his house was on fire. His family made it out safe. Unfortunately the house was destroyed.

I have wanted a puppy for a few years now. So today I went to the pound to look for my new companion. The pound had so many puppies to choose from. Then I saw a great one, she was a beautiful lab and I had to have her. I took her home, and now we are both happy
Jonah loves the first day of school. He got up early to be first at the bus stop. Jonah was the first in line. He sat on the bus quietly. Jonah was happy to arrive at school.

When I was a child grandpa took me to the park. Then he would take me in the tavern. I saw the paintings in the tavern, and had some snacks. Grandpa told me to not tell grandma we were there. I didn't tell grandma.
Allie went to the movies. She didn't know what kind of candy to get. So she got red vines. She never had them before. But she ended up loving them.

Pablo was feeling very sad lately. He wanted to see some family but wasn't really sure who to visit. He wasn't on the best of terms with his family anymore. He finally decided on his father, who lived far away. When Pablo visited his father he felt much better!
Tom experienced neck pain. He visited a chiropractor. The chiropractor performed adjustments on him. The chiropractor gave him medicine. The doctors treatment eliminated Tom's neck pain.

Betty woke up feeling very ill. She had a sore throat and ached all over. Betty called her work and said she wouldn't be going in today. She went back to sleep and stayed asleep all day. When Betty woke up again, she felt much better.

When aunt Lily died it was raining a lot. All the mourners were wet under their umbrellas. They tried to listen to the minister, but many were sneezing. When finally the minister was done, the sun came out. And everyone was in awe to see the light on the coffin.

Barry ended up failing the final exam. His class grade jumped from a 91 to 79. A few days later, he decided to go to the teachers office. He begged the teacher for a grade curve. The teacher knew that he failed the exam and didn't give him a curve.

It was Maria's first day on the police force after maternity leave. They got a call for a domestic disturbance. Maria found an infant, neglected in her crib. Maria hugged the baby close, changed her, and fed her milk. The paramedics told Maria that she had saved the baby

Rhonda was already late when heading to the airport for a flight. On the way, an accident caused heavy traffic. The traffic let up but then she came across a parade event. Rhonda thought the world was against her but was determined. She made it to the gate right as they were about to close the door.
Tim was angry at his girlfriend. He didn't know how to properly communicate that. Instead he just lashed out. Tim's girlfriend didn't appreciate it. They wound up breaking up under bad terms.

Janice decided to change jobs. Being a bank teller had become so mundane for her. She got a new job and began taking night courses at a local college. She had always wanted to work with children. Janice loves her new job as a teacher's aide.

Maria was waiting at the Nepalese restaurant for her order. As Maria waited, she checked her phone. She saw that she had one missed call from her boyfriend. Maria was about to call him back, but then her food was ready. Maria took her food and thanked the restaurant owner, and left.
John was nervous to go rafting. He was afraid of falling over. The guide assured him everything would be fine. John trusted him and had fun. He made it all the way without falling.
Tod was riding his bike to work. But a dog began chasing him. Tod pedaled faster and faster. But he couldn't out pedal the dog. Tod, however, realized the dog only wanted to play.

Susan decides to make fondant for a party she is planning. She buys a great block of cheese for the fondu. She also gets bread and fruit to dip into the cheese. Her friends are all very impressed with the fondu. Susan is proud of the fondu she made.

Janice and Marion were friends until Janice stole Marion's boyfriend. Both of them had known each other since grade school though. Finally Janice decided the best thing to do was break up. After Janice left the boyfriend, Marion got together with him. The two friends were never friends again because of the boyfriend.

They had a bowling league that they played in every year. It was comprised of a bunch of friends of theirs that always played. But one year they were bowling really well. They thought they had a chance to win the championship. And in the last week they won the last game to win the trophy.

I decided to look for a job. I got hired as a windshield repairman. The job was boring with lots of time to myself. I decided to study computer science during the downtime. I eventually learned enough programming to get a software job.

Maggie and her friends were excited to see Rosie's show live. The girls eagerly sat in their seats in the auditorium waiting. When Rosie came on stage, the cloud clapped. At the end of the show, the girls were thrilled. Maggie and her friends were happy to go home.

I wanted to make a ladder by which we could climb a tree. I ended up just hammering nails into the tree in an ascending pattern. Finally, I was ready to give the "nail ladder" a test. The nails cut through my shoes and left me with some scrapes. I did, however, make it to the top.
Dan bought a new poster for his dorm room. His roommate didn't like it. Sam kept it up anyway. One night his roommate drunkenly took it down. Sam found it in the dumpster and put it back up.

Dan had always wanted to see the Pacific Northwest. He looked for houses in the area to buy. Everything he found was way out of his price range. Suddenly Dan found a manufactured he could afford. He immediately called the agent to buy it.

Clara had saved for months so she could buy a new phone. She went to the store and had just the amount of money for the phone. When they gave her the phone, months of hard work had paid off. On the way home, she dropped the phone on the sidewalk. The phone cracked and Clara was very upset.

Barbara boarded the plane, drumming her fingers nervously on her bag. She was agitated by the upcoming meeting at company headquarters. Once aloft, the plane was rocked by severe turbulence, causing panic. Thankfully, the aircraft was unscathed and they landed safely. Barbara felt reborn and wasn't nervous about her meeting anymore.
A woman got a new job at the jail. It was full of dangerous criminals. She got to know a few of them. They became friends. She helped them escape.

Connor notices that his shorts are looking old. He decides he wants to sew himself some shorts. So he gets his sewing machine along with supplies for making shorts. Then he begins to sew. Now Connor has a few brand new shorts to wear.
Jervis is feeling hungry one day. He decides to eat a gyro. The gyro is delicious and filling. He feels much better. Jervis is glad he doesn't feel hungry any longer.

Max was on his school bus. He was starting to notice a weird smell. Other kids on the bus started noticing it as well. Soon everyone was trying to figure out the source of the smell. Then they discovered some old food left under a seat.

Clark had always been impressed by tap dancers. He decided he wanted to learn to tap dance too. He started taking a tap dance class after work. He practiced very hard until he was a great tap dancer. Clark was proud that he was not a tap dancer.
Mary went to the state fair. She ate corndogs and fried ice cream. After an hour, she felt queasy. Mary avoided riding her favorite roller coaster. She was unhappy during the rest of the night.
Martha was at Mcdonald's. She ordered a large order of fries. She took a bite of her fries. They were too salty! She got a refund by going back to the restaurant.

Fred had been going out with Suzy for a long time. He thought it was time to make it a relationship. He pulled her aside after class and asked her. She said yes. Fred was so happy that he went and told his friends.
Dan was a reckless young man. He would often do dangerous things. His girlfriend warned him to stop. Dan couldn't give up his thirst for extreme stunts. Dan lost his girlfriend over it.
Ed went on a hiking trip. He ventured deep into the forest. He was having a great time exploring the woods! But soon it began to grow dark. Ed decided to head back before he became lost.

Lea had a boyfriend whom she adored. One day, her boyfriend told her it was over. She was so sad and brokenhearted. She went and tattooed his name on her arm. She quickly regretted it and had it removed.

Last weekend, Sierra, the Human Resource Manager worked a shift. She brought her German Shepherd named Bear. Bear laid down, but when an employee stood up Bear attacked. He bit a Hispanic worker and a black worker. The black worker contacted an attorney, he felt disciplined by Bear.
Jane needed new shoes. She had broken the heel off her favorite pair. She finally decided to go to the store to buy a pair. She found some cute black ones. Jane bought them and went home.
The wind was howling. Max was feeling scared. He heard a branch snap. Then the lights went out. He made the best of it and went to sleep.

Dan went to a family party with his mom. His cousin offered him a drink when they arrived. Although Dan's mom prohibits from drinking, he tried to drink. However, he had to hide from his mom throughout the whole party. Eventually his mom found out and yelled at him.
Kate went into labor on Monday morning. Her husband rushed her to the hospital. The nurse called for her doctor. The doctor came to her room. The doctor delivered Kate's baby.

A tailor went to a mercer to purchase some cloth. The mercer tried to cheat the tailor. He measured out the cloth with a shortened ell stick. What the mercer did not realize was that the tailor was Flemish. Flemish ells are shorter, so the tailor got a fair price anyway.
Nick didn't want to go to a Private School. I didn't agree with him. One day he wrote me a poem about Schools. It was so encouraging I allowed him to change. Today he loves his new School.

Ashley was not a very good friend. She was negative when she spoke to her friends. She made them feel bad, not good. On Tuesday, her friends all told her they didn't like her anymore. Ashley decided she needed to work on her attitude.

The kids heard a familiar sound. It was the ice cream man! He drove around in his funny car and sold yummy treats. All the kids bought Popsicles. They loved buying treats from their favorite ice cream man!
Beth likes flowers. One day Beth decided to start her own garden. Beth went to the store to buy supplies. Beth planted many seeds. Beth is now patiently waiting for the flowers to grow.

Pat filmed a movie with his friends. He submitted the film to a film festival. The film took first place. For a while he was treated as if he was a movie star. Pat loved the fame and began to make another movie.

Anna lost her locket last week. She thought her sister might have taken it. When she asked her sister denied it. Anna looked through her things and found it. She didn't bring it up because she didn't want to fight.

Kate was in a sour mood. Her best friend had just cancelled their movie night. Kate sat and pouted, thinking of what she could do. After a minute, her mood cheered right back up. Kate took out her favorite movie and started watching it.

Jane wanted to do something special for her mother's birthday. She ordered a brand new set of cast iron cookware on Amazon. Jane placed the order with Amazon prime. On the day of her mother's birthday, Jane's present didn't arrive. Jane was able to get a partial refund for late shipping.

Amy and her dad went to the ice cream shop. She decided she wanted to try something different. She ordered a triple scoop strawberry ice cream cone. Strawberry were her favorite fruit so she was sure to like it. The Ice cream was the perfect treat to cool a hot summer day.
Ryan was coughing and had a sore throat. He tried taking cough drops and throat medicine. Ryan went to the doctor. The doctor prescribed better medicine. Ryan took the medicine and felt better.

Sam tried to finish her research paper at night. She overslept and ended up going to school late. Unfortunately, the printers in school were not working. Therefore, she couldn't print out her report. The professor failed her for not bringing her report.

Marissa really wanted to go to the state fair. Marissa's parents said she had to clean her room to go. She spent all weekend cleaning her room. Marissa's parents brought her to the fair. Marissa had a great time at the fair.
Jane wanted to surprise her boyfriend. She started baking cookies. Unfortunately she fell asleep by accident. She woke up too late. The cookies were burnt and her boyfriend dumped her.
One rainy day Amy was so bored. She looked out the window. She saw a big mud puddle. Amy asked her sister to go play in the puddle with her. Amy started a mud fight.
Tom and Jerry were riding their bikes. Suddenly the bike wheel fell off of Tom's bike. They were far away from home. Tom and Jerry had to walk all the way back. It was a horrible 3 hours for them.

After a long day at school, Mandy was tired. She wanted to nap before her favorite show started. But, Mandy had to clean her room and do her homework. She finished just in time to watch the show. But, Mandy fell asleep during the show.
Parker was driving to work. He didn't see a cat jump into the road. He hit the cat. He went out to take care of it. It died shortly after the accident.

Jenny went to the beach on a hot summer day. She laid out her towel on the white sand and put on sunscreen. The ocean breeze and smell of salt made her feel calm. She pulled out a book she never got a chance to finish. She enjoyed the rest of her day relaxing and reading.

Last Tuesday we tried to order takeout food. We decided on Chinese food. Both of our restaurants' phones were not working. Frustrated, we ordered pizza. Later we learned Comcast had an outage and many phone lines were down.

A young boy named Bill was having trouble writing his name. He could not complete his assignment for school because of this. He went to his parents and asked them for help. His dad was able to teach him how to write his name. The boy was excited and completed his homework in time.
A famous actress showed up at the red carpet. She made a big scene. All the paparazzi loved it. They published the story. She cried that night.

Jerry was hungry one day while watching movies. He got up and went to the kitchen to find a snack. He found a bag of popcorn and put it in the microwave. Jerry went back to sleep and forgot to check the popcorn. When he woke up, he checked the popcorn and it was burned.

The Baylor Bears basketball team played Yale on Thursday. Baylor was favored to win the game and came out flat. They were outplayed at both ends of the court. As the game progressed, you could see that Yale was the better team. Baylor kept it close but in the end they lost the game.

Kylie was watching television when an alert appeared. It told her that a tornado was coming! She gathered her family and took them to the basement. When it was over, their house had been destroyed. Still, they were happy to be alive.

John wanted to get a new watch. He asked around about which brand was best, and prices. He decided on a certain brand and headed to the store. I went with to keep him company and also help him look. He eventually found one and was extremely pleased with it!

Jack made a ham sandwich. As he went to eat it, he had a knock on the door. He laid the sandwich down. When he came back, his sandwich was gone. He looked around and saw his dog finishing his sandwich.

Andrew tried to push me on the floor. Although I held him down, he kept on fighting. Therefore, I held him horizontally and threw him. He horribly landed on the concrete. He remained on the floor for several seconds.

Bob has been overeating his entire life. Bob goes to his doctor complaining of chest pains. Bob's doctor says that if he doesn't lose weight he is going to die. So Bob starts going to Overeaters Anonymous meetings. Bob gets his addiction under control and loses 100 pounds.

Carlos was happy to learn that his article was published in the paper. He wanted to celebrate being a published author. Carlos decided to smoke a cigar to celebrate his achievement. After having a few puffs, he felt great. He was proud of being published.

Farmer Joe was not going to let his neighbor beat him this year. He was going to have the biggest pumpkin! He carefully put small slits into three of his little pumpkins vines. He fed each of them milk the entire growing season. His pumpkins easily won at the fair that year!
Tim bought a new pair of pants. They fit him too small. He figured he would lose weight and fit them soon. Tim worked out a few times and then gave up. He was never able to fit into those pants.

Nel wanted to make a fresh new loaf of bread. She gathered the ingredients and made the dough. Nel left the dough to rise while she worked on her computer. Nel became distracted and several hours passed. Nel returned to find that her dough was flat and oily.

Miley had wanted to sing in the church choir. She was told there was no room for any new singers. Last Sunday she was asked to fill in for a week. Miley gladly accepted the invite. She now sings with choir every week.

Last Sunday on my way to church I got a flat tire. I called my friend and asked if he could come and pick me up. He said yes and picked me up. We went to church together. After church he took me back to my care and helped me fix my tire.

Joe thought it looked like a great day to play golf. The sun was out and the temperature was perfect. He decided to leave work early and go play. As he was halfway through his game, a thunderstorm came. He had to seek shelter fast.

A man wanted to see a popular play. When he got to the box office, they were sold out. He walked away and was accosted by a showdy individual. The shadowy individual offered his extra ticket at a special rate. This excited the man and he promptly paid.

Kate is very clumsy by nature. She tends to walk slowly in hopes that she won't do something painful. Last weekend, she was in a hurry and stepped right off a curb. She twisted her ankle. She had to ice it and keep her foot up for a few days.

Irene entered a local singing contest, but she lost. Her friends took her out for a few drinks to commiserate. After a couple martinis, Irene felt better - much better. She decided to get up and sing karaoke for the bar patrons. To her joy, her audience clapped and cheered for her loudly!

David wasn't confident he would land the job. First, he was black and second he'd been out of work for a six months. He applied for a job at an SEO firm. They called him back after one month. They decided to hire David because he was Google certified.
Tina wanted to go on a date with brian. He finally asked her out. When he got to her place his car broke down. Tina had a great idea. They ended up having a wonderful night watching movies at home.

Stormy asked if I could be her new mama. She asked because she was little and didn't know who her mother was. She clung to me the whole time I was there. I cuddled her and played with her a lot. I cried when I had to leave her.

Jamie was just arriving at work. Her boss asked everyone to gather for a meeting. He announced a new policy that would change their pay. Everyone was very upset about this change. They decided to stage a walkout and Monica joined.

My roommate bought a new waffle maker! We went to the store to get waffle mix and all the fixings. We made banana waffles, chocolate chip waffles and strawberry waffles. We invited our neighbors over to help us eat them all. We made a huge mess but the waffle party was worth it!

Bella needed a second job. Her current income wasn't enough to support her and her family. She saw that her local bar needed help on the weekends. Bella got a job there and started making hundreds in tips. Her new part time job was everything her and her family needed!

Missy and her daughter were at the grocery store. Missy's daughter,Cindy, was holding onto a teddy bear. Cindy got distracted and sat her teddy bear down in one of the aisles. As they were going home, she realized that she had forgotten the bear. Missy drove back to the store for the teddy bear.
Karl was sick with a flu. He was prescribed some pills for the symptoms. Unfortunately Karl took the wrong ones. He felt even worse. Karl had to go to the hospital over it.

I was helping Leidy with her science fair project tonight. After she turned it in, she thanked me for all her help. A week later, I called her to arrange another meet-up. She didn't' respond until next month. The message says that she had to walk her dog and couldn't come.
Tina was getting very tired. She fell asleep in the car. It was at the wheel. All the sudden the car flipped over. Tina felt like she learnt a lesson.
Jimmy has plans to go to the car auction. He did not want to go by himself. He asked his wife to go with him. She agreed. Jimmy was very happy that he did not have to go alone.

Darlene's parents called to say they were coming home early. Darlene's hated boyfriend was on his way over to the house. Darlene needed to warn her boyfriend but he did not have a phone. Darlene ran to her boyfriend's house, hoping to catch him. Her boyfriend beat her to her house and her parents were home.
Tom got some fast food. He went through drive through. When he got home he realized it was stale. Tom called to complain. They allowed him to get free food next time.

Quinn woke up to the sound of roaring wind. She rushed to close the shutters on her windows. Just as Quinn closed the last one she heard a loud crashing sound. She ran to the room where she heard the crash and gasped. A street lamp had smashed through one of her windows!
James liked going on hikes. He hiked into the desert one day. He didn't take enough water! After an hour, he felt very faint. James sat down to recover.

We have an old stray cat that hangs around our house. We will sometimes feed it. The other day it was moaning and crying a lot. We went out to see if it was hurt. She was laying outside with a litter of kittens.

Gina and her friend Tami were chasing a boy around the class. He had taken a pencil from Gina and would not give it back. Tami and Gina decided to split up and cut him off. He had no where to run. Tami tackled the boy and Gina took the pencil from him.

Anita had a brilliant idea which led to a question. She brought some obsolete computer books out into an abandoned field. She then shot the pages right out of them, taking notes. Anita was satisfied she'd found the answer to her question. She now knew how many books to pack in her bag to block bullets.

She was supposed to go on the field trip. She showed up at school ready to go. Since she skipped school the day before, they wouldn't let her. She hid in the agri building all day. She sneaked back home after 2 pm.

Rob has a crush on a girl from work. Rob has been planning for weeks to ask her out. One evening as his crush was leaving work Rob stops her. He asks her if she would like to go on a date. She tells Rob she is not interested in him and Rob is heartbroken.

Kevin was the smallest boy on his basketball team. He often couldn't make as many plays as the bigger boys. Kevin didn't stop practicing everyday at his home. He developed a method of quickly dribbling around the bigger boys. Kevin was soon just as good a player as all the other kids.

Alissa needed a job badly. She got a call for an interview at Bath and Body Works. Alissa dressed very nicely. The manager was impressed when she knew what a demo was. Alissa got the $10 an hour job even without references.

The shot clock ran out of time. However, Jimmy continued to make a shot. The referee told him that his shot didn't count. He became furious and threw the ball on the ground. As a result, he received a technical foul.

I bought a great pair of red shoe at the shoe store. I tried them on with my dress when I got home. I realized the shoes made me taller than my husband. I had to return them to the store. I ended up getting a white pair with no heels.

When I was a kid, I lived by a spooky home. The kids in my neighborhood joked that it was haunted. One day, we got the idea to try to get inside of it. We snuck out one night and tried to get in. Our parents caught us and called my phone, so I went home.

Fran loved reading books. She joined her university's English club to discuss them. The club mostly argued about themes. She started her own book club in the university center. They had great discussions and Fran really enjoyed herself.

Tom wanted to get his house painted. He asked his neighbors to refer him to a company. Tom called two of the painting companies mentioned. Tom got the prices of the companies. He hired the cheaper company to paint his house.

Rachel worked at an office for three years. There was a leak of confidential information. Somehow Rachel was framed and blamed for the leak. Rachel was suspended from her job. After an investigation Rachel was found not guilty of the leak.
I was walking down the street. I saw a homeless man. He didn't have shoes or socks. I decided to give him my socks. I realized the importance of charity.
Bobby loved to cook for his wife. His wife loved his cooking. On Friday night, Billy cooked something his wife didn't like. She told him she liked it anyways. He never knew she didn't like it.

Roger wanted to be an astronaut when he grew up. As a kid, he played with toy rockets and space men. When they closed the space shuttle program, Roger was sad. He knew he still wanted to reach the sky. Now, Roger is working on getting his pilot's license to fly planes.
I wanted to crochet a scarf. I sat down and began my work. I crocheted after work for many days. When I decided I was finished, I tried the scarf on. I'd made it way too long!

Jonah was signed up for an open mic. It would be his first public performance. He almost backed out because of nerves. Luckily his supportive girlfriend helped him past that. He performed and did a great job.
Lance is feeling lonely one day. He knows that singing always make him feels better. He decides to sing a short song. He feels much better after. Lance temporarily feels less lonely.
The Smiths went on a family picnic. They went to a nearby park. The park was near a lake. They brought sandwiches and pie. After a few hours, the Smiths went home.
Anna finished eating her eggs. She took her plate, fork, and coffee cup to the sink. Anna washed her dishes in the sink. She used a towel to dry them. Then, she put her dishes away.

I wanted to take my dog to a dog park today. I was afraid of how she would act around all the other dogs there. We got in the car and headed down there. She immediately ran around and played with the other dogs. I cannot wait to take her back to the dog park.

Tina never wore high heels. She was going to a big dance. Tina decided to wear heels for the first time. Within the first hour her feet were killing her. Tina had to take them off and stopped dancing.

John heard that his neighbor lost his wife to cancer. John waited several weeks. Then John started visiting the neighbor, sometimes bringing food. Over time, they became fast friends. Now, John and the widower are like brothers.
Diana really liked theme parks. But she easily got sick because of them. She decided to ride the fastest one. Unsurprisingly this made her very sick. And she puked everywhere due to it.
Amy went bowling with her friends. She wasn't a very good bowler. She felt sure she'd come in last place. But she played surprisingly well. Amy came in second place!
Harry was at the park. He saw a big, green slide. Harry ran to the slide. He climbed the ladder. Harry slid down the slide.
Yesterday we went to the middle of town. It was basically nowhere. So we had no service. It was terrible. I felt so bored.

It was Sarah's first day of college. She arrived on campus and unpacked all her belongings in her dorm. She met her new roommate and she was really friendly. They met other freshmen on campus and ate dinner. Sarah was really excited to be away from her parents!

David's mother's birthday was coming up. Glenn had forgotten about this until the day before it. When he remembered he ran out in a panic to buy a gift. He managed to buy a book just before the bookstore closed. His mother loved the book when he gave it to her the next day.

Ashley has had long hair all of her life. She decided to get her hair cut short one day. After she had it shaved, she realized how much she hated long hair. Now she never has long hair and keeps her hair very short. She's a lot happier and looks a lot better, too.

Our building has a clubroom with free coffee. One day we went down for coffee. The room was out of creamers. The concierge told us a few kids took the creamers. He said the manager would tell the parents.

Tim had a gambling problem. He was betting a large portion of his income on scratch off tickets. Tim never won any money. His wife urged him to go seek help for his problem. Tim was able to quit gambling with the help of a therapist.

Ben loved the natural history museum. His favorite was the dinosaur exhibit. As he headed towards the massive skeletons and fossils, he paused. A golden tomb caught his eye. Ben left that day a new fan of ancient Egypt.

Lucy awoke and jumped out of bed. It was Independence Day and she was excited. She ran and asked her grandma if they could go see fireworks. Grandma reminded her that wouldn't be for hours. Lucy decided to play to pass the time.
My little cousin was missing yesterday. He never got home from school. His parents were really worried. It turns out he went to a friend's house. He got in trouble for not telling anyone about it.
Maya picked an apple from the tree. She was hungry and wanted a snack. But when she bit into it, her face twisted. She had bitten right into a slimy worm! Maya spit it out, disgusted.

Janet wanted to surprise her boyfriend. She decided to bake him some cookies. She spent a lot of time making sure they came out perfect. She spent even more time decorating them. Janet's boyfriends was thrilled.

Dan was not a very good cook. He had watched a video on how to cook steak. He wanted to put his abilities to the test. He went to store to buy the biggest steak they had. He brought it home and cooked it perfectly.

Rhonda loved getting compliments on her yard. She entered a local contest for the best yard in town. To boost her chances, Rhonda sprayed the lawn with green paint. That night it froze. Rhonda woke to see fake green grass standing out in a sea of brown.

The group was walking by the sidewalk. A pick-up truck drove by. A lot of car exhaust diffused from the truck. As soon as it surrounded the boys, they covered their faces. In addition, they immediately moved in another direction.

The kids loved playing music. The drums were the most fun. They'd pound on them all day and night. When it was time for the band concert, they were prepared. THey had practiced their songs for months!

Walter always wanted the thermostat at 72 degrees. His wife always wanted it at 75. Every time they got the chance they would change it. It became a bit of a game after a while. Eventually it averaged out to 74.
Quentin decided he wanted to start attending church. He found a local church nearby his home. Quentin started going every week. He made friends there. Quentin was happy to be going to church.

Abby couldn't stand babysitting little Josh Tyler. He would often play mean tricks on Abby. One time he hid in the broom closet for two hours. Abby called the police thinking he was missing. When the police arrived they found him in the closet sleeping.

John had just finished eating an entire bag of chips. He looked down at the empty bag in disgust. He knew he had to make better snacking choices. John started making a list of healthier choices. He wrote Shopping List at the top of the paper.
Tina ordered an ice cream. She ordered two scoops. She then walked to the car. On the way she dropped a scoop. She was horrified and had to pick it up.

Kimmy liked to listen to the radio. She hated not being able to listen to what she wanted to, though. She decided to try out Pandora. She could now listen to what she wanted to. She was a very happy listener.
Derrick had just lost his job. He typed out a new resume. Derrick went to several businesses. Derrick handed out his resumes. He had a new job in a week.

Mia went to the zoo on a field trip with her class. She had never seen so many different animals before! They spent hours walking around the exhibits. A lion roared as she passed by him. Mia decided that the lion was her favorite animal.

Hannah decided to paint her room a fancy design. She then attempted to do it. Hannah was making a mess and the design looked awful. She decided to hire a professional. Now her room looks much better than it did.

Bill loved to play in the forest. One day, while playing a game, bill got himself lost. He walked around the forest for hours. Finally, his mother came into the forest and brought bill back home. Bill was happy to be home with his mother!

Nancy had to work in the school daycare for a class credit. Most kids made fun of the teenaged mothers all the time. Nancy was sure that the girls must be rude and promiscuous. She was surprised to find that all of them were really nice. From then on, she never made fun of people like that.
